casebody.data:
No. 17,

Original.

Ex parte: In the Matter of The St. Louis Mining and Milling Company of Montana, Petitioner. Submitted April 29, 1907. Decided May 27, 1907. Mr. Jackson H. Ralston for petitioner. Mr. Charles J. Hughes, Jr., Mr. W. E. Cullen, Mr. A. B. Browne and Mr. Alexander Britton for respondent.

Per Curiam. Rule discharged and petition for writ of mandamus dismissed. In re Rice, Petitioner, 155 U. S. 396; In re Pollitz, Petitioner, this day decided, ante, p. 323.
